item.title: Introduction
item.description: This project aims to resolve those anomalies and make brain death declaration legal and practicable. We want brain death declaration to be legally valid, practically feasible, and socially accepted among doctors. It is unclear whether “brain death” is death in all instances, or only for the purposes of organ transplantation. it is unclear how deaths may be declared. It is unclear when such deaths may be declared. It is unclear what the consequences of such a declaration are.
